right.text: I've been thinking for about 10 seconds now, and I still don't see what is wrong with my random poll...

left.text: that was just a random question I asked, and--fuck it. never mind.

right.text: i am going to make bencomics about jazzy's random poll.

left.text: jazzy think really hard about it

right.text: jazzy. the more you try to defend this, the more material i have for making bencomics.

left.text: I was only asking your honest opinion...you're the second group I've asked, and the first group was unanimous about Zelda being better looking than Peach. there is no deeper meaning than that
